newsitem.title: UK: BTR active, drops to more than five-year low.
newsitem.headline: BTR active, drops to more than five-year low.

text.p: Shares in BTR Plc dropped to their lowest level in over five years on Tuesday in heavy volume amid continued disappointment following last week's profit warning from the industrial conglomerate, dealers said.
The stock was down 6p at 213p, after falling as low as 212p, in volume of 33.6 million shares, making it the most active stock in the London market.

Dealers noted a lack of buying interest in the stock following a huge placing of 80 million shares last Thursday -- the same day as its fifth profit warning in the past three years -- at well below the then market price.
"It looks as if a few people are just getting fed up with the stock and deciding it is dead money," said one market-maker.
